class_notes: The Personal Financial Investing course will teach students approaches to grow their net worth over long-time horizons while managing their risk. The course focuses on explaining the different features of various financial securities and the mechanics of participating in these markets.   Topics include stocks and the stock market, bonds, asset allocation, risk management, brokerage accounts, retirement accounts, real estate, mortgage alternatives, and behavioral finance.
